settings.question: What platforms does the bot work with?
settings.answer: The bot works with TradingView, the industry-standard charting platform. Bot and strategies are synced to your TradingView account.

settings.question: Do I need trading experience to use the bot?
settings.answer: No! The bot comes with proven strategies already configured. However, we recommend understanding basic trading concepts. You can choose to automate execution or trade manually with the signals.

settings.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
settings.answer: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.

settings.question: What's included in the Discord community?
settings.answer: You'll get access to our private Discord server with real-time bot alerts, strategy discussions, and a community of traders. Bot subscribers also get access to an exclusive bot discussion channel with dedicated support.

settings.question: Do I need the Professional Setup add-on?
settings.answer: The Professional Setup is optional but recommended for those who want white-glove service. It includes personalized bot installation, custom configuration, and one-on-one onboarding.

settings.question: Do you offer coaching or educational content?
settings.answer: Yes! We offer a separate Coaching subscription ($79/mo) that includes 60+ hours of comprehensive video coaching and educational content. Visit our Products page to learn more about all available options.
